definitions.text: a system of two stars that revolve around each other under their mutual gravitation
a pre-compiled, pre-linked program that is ready to run under a given operating system; a binary for one operating system will not run on a different operating system
examples: the same source code can be compiled to produce different binaries for different operating systems

definitions.text: of or pertaining to a number system have 2 as its base
consisting of two (units or components or elements or terms)
examples: a binary star is a system in which two stars revolve around each other
the binary number system has two as its base
